description: This trap is sent each time a transport connection
is rejected by a partner DLSw during Capabilities
Exchanges. The emission of this trap is controlled
by dlswTrapCntlTConnPartnerReject.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD DLSW-MIB::dlswTrapTConnPartnerReject DLSW-MIB::dlswTConnOperTDomain o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 DLSW-MIB::dlswTConnOperRemoteTAddr s EXAMPLE

description: The object identifier indicates the transport domain
of this transport connection.
variables.name: DLSW-MIB::dlswTConnOperTDomain

description: The remote transport address of this transport connection.
variables.name: DLSW-MIB::dlswTConnOperRemoteTAddr

description: This trap is sent each time a protocol violation is
detected for a transport connection. The emission of this
trap is controlled by dlswTrapCntlTConnProtViolation.

event.Summary: DLSw protocol violation on transport connection with $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD DLSW-MIB::dlswTrapTConnProtViolation DLSW-MIB::dlswTConnOperTDomain o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 DLSW-MIB::dlswTConnOperRemoteTAddr s EXAMPLE

description: The object identifier indicates the transport domain
of this transport connection.
variables.name: DLSW-MIB::dlswTConnOperTDomain

description: The remote transport address of this transport connection.
variables.name: DLSW-MIB::dlswTConnOperRemoteTAddr

description: This trap is sent each time a transport connection
enters `connected' state. The emission of this trap
is controlled by dlswTrapCntlTConn.

event.Summary: DLSw transport connection with $v2 is up

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD DLSW-MIB::dlswTrapTConnUp DLSW-MIB::dlswTConnOperTDomain o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 DLSW-MIB::dlswTConnOperRemoteTAddr s EXAMPLE

description: The object identifier indicates the transport domain
of this transport connection.
variables.name: DLSW-MIB::dlswTConnOperTDomain

description: The remote transport address of this transport connection.
variables.name: DLSW-MIB::dlswTConnOperRemoteTAddr

description: This trap is sent each time a transport connection
enters `disconnected' state. The emission of this trap
is controlled by dlswTrapCntlTConn.

event.Summary: DLSw transport connection with $v2 is down

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD DLSW-MIB::dlswTrapTConnDown DLSW-MIB::dlswTConnOperTDomain o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 DLSW-MIB::dlswTConnOperRemoteTAddr s EXAMPLE

description: The object identifier indicates the transport domain
of this transport connection.
variables.name: DLSW-MIB::dlswTConnOperTDomain

description: The remote transport address of this transport connection.
variables.name: DLSW-MIB::dlswTConnOperRemoteTAddr

description: This trap is sent each time a circuit enters `connected'
state. The emission of this trap is controlled by
dlswTrapCntlCircuit.

event.Summary: DLSw circuit connection between $v1 and $v3 is up

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD DLSW-MIB::dlswTrapCircuitUp DLSW-MIB::dlswCircuitS1Mac s EXAMPL DLSW-MIB::dlswCircuitS1Sap s E DLSW-MIB::dlswCircuitS2Mac s EXAMPL DLSW-MIB::dlswCircuitS2Sap s E

description: The MAC Address of End Station 1 (S1) used for this circuit.
variables.name: DLSW-MIB::dlswCircuitS1Mac

description: The SAP at End Station 1 (S1) used for this circuit.
variables.name: DLSW-MIB::dlswCircuitS1Sap

description: The MAC Address of End Station 2 (S2) used for this circuit.
variables.name: DLSW-MIB::dlswCircuitS2Mac

description: The SAP at End Station 2 (S2) used for this circuit.
variables.name: DLSW-MIB::dlswCircuitS2Sap

description: This trap is sent each time a circuit enters `disconnected'
state. The emission of this trap is controlled by
dlswTrapCntlCircuit.

event.Summary: DLSw circuit connection between $v1 and $v3 is down

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD DLSW-MIB::dlswTrapCircuitDown DLSW-MIB::dlswCircuitS1Mac s EXAMPL DLSW-MIB::dlswCircuitS1Sap s E DLSW-MIB::dlswCircuitS2Mac s EXAMPL DLSW-MIB::dlswCircuitS2Sap s E

description: The MAC Address of End Station 1 (S1) used for this circuit.
variables.name: DLSW-MIB::dlswCircuitS1Mac

description: The SAP at End Station 1 (S1) used for this circuit.
variables.name: DLSW-MIB::dlswCircuitS1Sap

description: The MAC Address of End Station 2 (S2) used for this circuit.
variables.name: DLSW-MIB::dlswCircuitS2Mac

description: The SAP at End Station 2 (S2) used for this circuit.
variables.name: DLSW-MIB::dlswCircuitS2Sap
